Html:
Hi,

I tried to Delete one data using my Odata service using the DELETE method , there is a

'no handler for data' error returns

And the error as

{
    "error": {
        "message": {
            "lang": "en-US", "value": "This release of library support only GET (read) request, received a request with method DELETE"
        }
    }
}

I tried with datajs version 1.1.0, and datajs version 0.0.3. (minimum and maximum) : same error for both.

Odata service created using mySQL connector (http://odatamysqlphpconnect.codeplex.com/)

 please help me to solve this issue

Regards
Ratheesh

Hi ratheeshkr,

I looked at mySQL connector service provider manual and from what I see it doesn't have the IDataServiceUpdateProvider interface which is responsible for making the update requests, so you can't make update requests to services that use mySQL connector.

﻿

---

Hussein
